list.name: Changes
list.comment:
fix:Game lifecycle
This commit resolves an issue where the round winner, and the highest points are being calculated incorrectly which resulted to the game logic getting wrong each round.

recent.name: C:\Users\asthe\Documents\Programming Files\Java Files\Gitlab School Repo Project\2023-2_9329-finteam2_java\huh

task.summary:
chore: Updated compiled files
This commit updates the generated files resulting from compiling the new IDL file for both the client and server components.

fix: Game class
This commit introduces the new version of the Game class to comply with the new changes in the idl structure and the server logic.

chore: Updated servant classes
This commit introduces the updated servant class that conforms with the new idl structure.
MINOR CHANGES: - changed some return types in the ServerJDBC.class to avoid compile errors due to a restructure in the servant class

chore: Updated client package
This commit resolves compile errors due to some restructuring in the idl file.

feat: Implement waiting room and Game room
This commit adds the feature to join a game.
TO BE FIXED: - After round 1, the rounds are being created infinitely.

fix: Resolve infinite round initialization and inaccurate round distribution
This commit addresses two main issues: 1. Resolves an issue where after the first round ends, multiple rounds are started simultaneously, leading to the creation and start of over 100 rounds instantaneously. This problem is fixed by ensuring that only one round is started at a time. 2. Fixes an issue where players receive different character sets due to rounds being created individually for each player. Now, all players receive the same round, ensuring consistency across the game.

feat: Implement game UI, round popup, and lobby logout
This commit introduces several features: 1. All components in the game UI are now updating after each round passes. 2. A round popup will be displayed on the center screen before starting the round. 3. A logout button is placed in the lobby UI that redirects the player back to the login UI.

chore: Update idl structure
This commit adds a new exception in the idl file which will be utilized when a player submits a word to the server for validation.

chore: Update idl structure
This commit adds a new exception in the idl file which will be utilized when a player submits a word to the server for validation.

fix: fixed an issue for the round winner
This commit resolves an issue where the round winner is not being evaluated properly

chore: New method added in idl file
This commit adds additional method to check whether the server has already finished evaluating the results of the current round before proceeding to the next round.

fix:Game lifecycle
This commit resolves an issue where the round winner, and the highest points are being calculated incorrectly which resulted to the game logic getting wrong each round.
